# Load dependencies and source data

```{r load_data, message=FALSE}

library(Matrix)
library(scran)
library(igraph)
library(reshape2)
library(knitr)
library(scater)
library(scales)
library(biomaRt)
library(tibble)
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)

ncores = 1

#root.dir = "/Users/alsu/Develop/spatial/mouse_embryo/"
root.dir = "/nfs/research1/marioni/alsu/spatial/mouse_embryo/"
source(paste0(root.dir, "amScripts_mouseEmbryoFISH/core_functions.R"))

anno = read.table(paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/geneInfo/stat.tab"), header = TRUE, sep = "\t", stringsAsFactors = FALSE, comment.char = "$")
CT = read.table(paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/celltyping/CT__freeze__21042020.tab"), header = TRUE, sep = "\t", stringsAsFactors = FALSE, comment.char = "$")

# load stitching
counts.stitched = readRDS(paste0(root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/pca_K10_mean.rds"))



```


# non-0 counts

all genes that have at least one non-zero count

```{r get-non-zero}

genes.sum = apply(counts.stitched , 1 , sum)
idx = which(genes.sum > 0)
counts.stitched.nonzero = counts.stitched[idx,]
saveRDS(counts.stitched.nonzero, file = paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/pca_K10_mean__nonZero.rds"))

```


# Seq-FISH genes


```{r get-stitch-seq}

counts.stitched.seq = counts.stitched[rownames(counts.stitched) %in% anno$external_gene_name[anno$experiment == "seq"],]
saveRDS(counts.stitched.seq, file = paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/pca_K10_mean__seq.rds"))

```

# smFISH genes


```{r get-stitch-sm}

counts.stitched.sm = counts.stitched[rownames(counts.stitched) %in% anno$external_gene_name[anno$experiment == "sm"],]
saveRDS(counts.stitched.sm, file = paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/pca_K10_mean__sm.rds"))

```


# Custom datasets

## Nowotschin et al., 2019

```{r custom-nowotschin}

df = read.table(paste0( root.dir, "data/QC_stitching/Nowotschin_et_al__2019.tab"), header = TRUE, sep = "\t", stringsAsFactors = FALSE, comment.char = "$")
unq.gene = intersect(rownames(counts.stitched), unique(df$Gene))
counts.stitched.custom = counts.stitched[unq.gene,]
saveRDS(counts.stitched.custom, file = paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/custom/pca_K10_mean__Nowotschin.rds"))


```


## Ibarra-Sorria et al., 2018

```{r custom-ibarra_sorria}

df = read.table(paste0( root.dir, "data/QC_stitching/Ibarra_Sorria_et_al_2018.tab"), header = TRUE, sep = "\t", stringsAsFactors = FALSE, comment.char = "$")
unq.gene = intersect(rownames(counts.stitched), unique(df$Gene))
counts.stitched.custom = counts.stitched[unq.gene,]
saveRDS(counts.stitched.custom, file = paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/custom/pca_K10_mean__Ibarra_Sorria.rds"))

```

# HVGs

## All 

```{r hvgs-all}

HVGs = getHVGs(counts.stitched, min.mean = 1e-3, gene_df = genes)
counts.stitched.hvgs = counts.stitched[HVGs,]
saveRDS(counts.stitched.hvgs , file = paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/pca_K10_mean__hvgs.rds"))

```

## per CT

```{r hvgs-brain-spinal}

for (i in unique(CT$CT)){
  idx = which( CT$CT == i )
  HVGs = getHVGs(counts.stitched[, colnames(counts.stitched) %in% CT$uniqueID[idx]], min.mean = 1e-3, gene_df = genes)
  counts.stitched.hvgs = counts.stitched[HVGs,]
  saveRDS(counts.stitched.hvgs , file = paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/CT/pca_K10_mean__hvgs__", i , ".rds"))
}

```
